Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: Hey hey! Let's do a quick rundown on what the people are buzzing about today. It seems like Western Australia is in hot water with its energy policies. The State Opposition called for a moratorium on power disconnections as thousands of households within the state are facing sky-high energy bills. On top of this the Australian government is cracking down on wage theft which refers to employers who purposefully underpay their workers' superannuation. Meanwhile the gas industry may have to pay higher tax rates as the government has been aggressively pursuing tax hikes on big corporations.
